title: Nvidia unveils AI models for faster, cheaper weather forecasts
description: Nvidia is aiming to replace expensive and time-consuming conventional weather simulations with AI-driven versions that the company said can rival or ​exceed the accuracy of older methods

title: Microsoft rolls out next generation of AI chips, takes aim at Nvidia's software
description: The new “Maia 200” chip ‌comes online this week in a data ​centre in Iowa, with plans for a second location in Arizona, Microsoft said

title: FiberMall Accelerates Global AI Infrastructure with Next-Generation Optical Networking Solutions
description: The global leader in optical communications unveils an expanded portfolio of high-speed interconnects—including 800G transceivers and active optical cables—designed to power the demands of artificial intelligence and machine learning clusters. SHENZHEN, China — FiberMall, leading global provider of optical networking equipment and interconnect solutions, announced a strategic expansion of its product portfolio specifically optimized for [...]The post FiberMall Accelerates Global AI Infrastructure with Next-Generation Optical Networking Solutions appeared first on TechBullion.

title: Nvidia Launches AI Technologies to Aid Weather Forecasting
description: Nvidia Corp. is offering new open-source software and models designed to help governments and businesses more easily use artificial intelligence and complex data to build their own weather forecasting systems. The chipmaker’s new Earth-2 platform includes a pair of AI-based ...

title: Dario Amodei doubles down on AI risks, and calls out the industry
description: Even as Anthropic ships its powerful AI agent tool, its CEO warns AI could spiral quickly, with risks not only from rogue AI, but also irresponsible players.
